messages: 7d03c893d5e319aff7504f429cfca64a (14:05): Hmmmmmmmm
7d03c893d5e319aff7504f429cfca64a (14:05): DataStream: looks like it could possibly be a disk problem
7d03c893d5e319aff7504f429cfca64a (14:05): I removed the disk with metaoffline -f d101 d111
7d03c893d5e319aff7504f429cfca64a (14:05): then metadetach -f d101 d111 I think it was
7d03c893d5e319aff7504f429cfca64a (14:06): then removed it, then bunged another one in... then formatted it... then went metattach d101 d111 and then metasync d101
7d03c893d5e319aff7504f429cfca64a (14:06): and ahhh crap.
7d03c893d5e319aff7504f429cfca64a (14:06): It went and crapped out in the same place again.
7d03c893d5e319aff7504f429cfca64a (14:07): I guess the disk is fruity.
7d03c893d5e319aff7504f429cfca64a (14:07): The 2nd disk.
7d03c893d5e319aff7504f429cfca64a (14:07): The 'Last Error' one.
7d03c893d5e319aff7504f429cfca64a (14:08): Its stopped syncing in the same place again. around 25% thru it stopps.
7d03c893d5e319aff7504f429cfca64a (14:12): So I might just remove the 'Last Error' disk.
